mapper.insert: INSERT INTO player(account, passwords, name, sex, profile, city,description) VALUES (#{account},#{passwords},#{name},#{sex},#{profile},#{city},#{description})
mapper.select: SELECT count(account) FROM player WHERE account=#{account}
SELECT * FROM player WHERE account=#{account} and passwords=#{passwords}
SELECT playerId,profile,name,sex,description,city FROM player ORDER BY playerId DESC
